long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify lead management with this Chrome extension. Save and organize leads with ease, capturing URLs, notes, and content while browsing. Retrieve your leads anytime, even offline. Export leads in text or HTML format for analysis or sharing. To ensure data security, a double-click on the delete button clears all information. Streamline your lead management workflow with this powerful and user-friendly tool.
